description: Clustered bellflower (Campanula glomerata 'Superba') is an amazing perennial plant that will bring great beauty to any garden. This flower produces stunning clusters of bell-shaped blooms that will attract beneficial insects to your garden. It is a low-maintenance plant that thrives in part-shaded areas with moist soil. Its cut foliage and flowers are perfect for bouquets. The blooms come in a range of colors, ranging from palest blues through to deep purples. It is extremely easy to care for and very tolerant of any level of temperature. Clustered bellflower is an incredibly tough plant that will be an eye-catching addition to any outdoor space.
